reasoning: Anterior circulation TIA accounts for approximately 75% of TIAs with incidence around 45 per 100k globally. Based on epidemiological studies of cerebrovascular disease.
source: Rothwell PM et al. (2004). Population-based study of event-rate, incidence, case fatality, and mortality for all acute vascular events in all age groups. Lancet. 363(9411):1925-1931
